name: Demon Skies (chaotic)
description:
Demon Skies

Equipped with your enchanted bow and arrow, survive as long as possible in the evil demon infested skies! You've only got the one life and the one arrow... so good luck!

Move with WASD keys, or ARROW keys. Click and release to fire an arrow (when retrieved) , touch the corner of the screen to flip to the opposite side, the same goes with the arrows! (and enemies!)

Credits

- Sound FX made with ChipTone

- Music by wyver9 and brainstormesque from newgrounds

- Game ported from scratch - https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/168730174
